content.title: Configure the Service
content.body:
1. On the top-left corner, click the service name.
  2. In the Name box, type RecipientStorage.
  3. Under Sample Data, drag the Recipients.zip file from the extracted files.
  4. For the Delete Strategy option, select Hard Delete.
  5. Click Save.
  6. Close the Edit Object Service window.
    It may take some time for Iris to add the service to the Project Services section.
